columns.name: cache_cluster_id
columns.description: An unique identifier for ElastiCache cluster.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the cache cluster.

columns.name: cache_node_type
columns.description: The name of the compute and memory capacity node type for the cluster.

columns.name: cache_cluster_status
columns.description: The current state of this cluster, one of the following values: available, creating, deleted, deleting, incompatible-network, modifying, rebooting cluster nodes, restore-failed, or snapshotting.

columns.name: at_rest_encryption_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables encryption at-rest when set to true.

columns.name: auth_token_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables using an AuthToken (password) when issuing Redis commands.

columns.name: auto_minor_version_upgrade
columns.description: This parameter is currently disabled.

columns.name: cache_cluster_create_time
columns.description: The date and time when the cluster was created.

columns.name: cache_subnet_group_name
columns.description: The name of the cache subnet group associated with the cluster.

columns.name: client_download_landing_page
columns.description: The URL of the web page where you can download the latest ElastiCache client library.

columns.name: configuration_endpoint
columns.description: Represents a Memcached cluster endpoint which can be used by an application to connect to any node in the cluster.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: The name of the cache engine (memcached or redis) to be used for this cluster.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: The version of the cache engine that is used in this cluster.

columns.name: num_cache_nodes
columns.description: The number of cache nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: preferred_availability_zone
columns.description: The name of the Availability Zone in which the cluster is located or 'Multiple' if the cache nodes are located in different Availability Zones.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which maintenance on the cluster is performed.

columns.name: replication_group_id
columns.description: The replication group to which this cluster belongs.

columns.name: snapshot_retention_limit
columns.description: The number of days for which ElastiCache retains automatic cluster snapshots before deleting them.

columns.name: snapshot_window
columns.description: The daily time range (in UTC) during which ElastiCache begins taking a daily snapshot of your cluster.

columns.name: transit_encryption_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

columns.name: auth_token_last_modified_date
columns.description: The date the auth token was last modified.

columns.name: ip_discovery
columns.description: The network type associated with the cluster, either ipv4 or ipv6.

columns.name: network_type
columns.description: Must be either ipv4, ipv6, or dual_stack.

columns.name: preferred_outpost_arn
columns.description: The outpost ARN in which the cache cluster is created.

columns.name: replication_group_log_delivery_enabled
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether log delivery is enabled for the replication group.

columns.name: transit_encryption_mode
columns.description: A setting that allows you to migrate your clients to use in-transit encryption, with no downtime.

columns.name: cache_parameter_group
columns.description: Status of the cache parameter group.

columns.name: notification_configuration
columns.description: Describes a notification topic and its status.

columns.name: pending_modified_values
columns.description: A group of settings that are applied to the cluster in the future, or that are currently being applied.

columns.name: security_groups
columns.description: A list of VPC Security Groups associated with the cluster.

columns.name: cache_nodes
columns.description: A list of cache nodes that are members of the cluster.

columns.name: cache_security_groups
columns.description: A list of cache security group elements, composed of name and status sub-elements.

columns.name: log_delivery_configurations
columns.description: Returns the destination, format, and type of the logs.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the cluster.
